meanings.sent1: The kind samaritan helped the old lady cross the street.
meanings.sent2: I am grateful for the samaritan who found and returned my lost wallet.
meanings.sent3: The samaritan at the food bank always has a smile and a helping hand.
meanings.sent4: She was a true samaritan, always ready to lend a hand to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The samaritan's generosity knew no bounds, touching the lives of many in the community.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Samaritans, an ancient people of central Palestine.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologists discovered ancient samaritan artifacts in the ruins.
meanings.sent2: The samaritan culture had unique traditions and beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The samaritan pottery found at the site was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace was adorned with a samaritan symbol from ancient times.
meanings.sent5: The historian studied the samaritan language to understand their civilization better.
